content:
That's a wonderful message! I'm sure Emma will be touched by your thoughtful words and appreciate the gift even more with that personalized touch.

It was my pleasure to help you with ideas for Emma's gift and your brother's trip to Tokyo. I hope they both have an amazing time and enjoy their respective experiences.

If you need any more help or have any other questions, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I wish you and your siblings all the best, and I'm sure you'll make many more wonderful memories together!

Take care, and happy gifting!
